title: Chintz Fragments, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for black, 2 reds and 2 purples applied over resist by brush and pen. Madder dyed.  Blue applied by brush over resist. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 58 x 37.5 cm (22 13/16 x 14 3/4 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 56 x 22 cm (22 1/16 x 8 11/16 in.)
description: Two fragments which show the mirror image of a flowering tree motif.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragments, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for black, 2 reds and 2 purples applied over resist by brush and pen. Madder dyed.  Blue applied by brush over resist. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-55-a,b.
